introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: The name „Navarium” is a latin acronym with multiple meanings that describes our activity.
listItems: -arium: suffix to mark new objects for their purpose, the place where something is done with the prefix

services.title: Services
services.service3: Preparation of the licensing documentation for ships and floating structures that are new, imported or in need of conversion. Carrying out the authorization of the plans.
services.service4: Professional support in the official ship inspections, conduction of required tests.
